Articles.Content:
Hello everyone !

I am just a simple french visitor who was landed on Kerbin to manage the new Kerbal Space Program as newbie rocket engineer !

After fast studies on demo version, I've just to purchase the last KSP version and try to develop a stable and reliable launcher able to send Kerbonauts on the Mun and back them safely and do the other things, not because they are easy, but because they are hard.

I begin successfully by light project with single place capsule.

But seeding three kerbonauts to the Mun was a challenge many much difficult, needing long tries and developments.

Then, it now works nicely, and launchers continue to be improved. The Satoorn V Type L rocket is the last development released on launch pad, which allows now to reach new goals and exciting challenges.
How is your brave kerbonaut going to get back to kerbin?

How is your brave kerbonaut going to get back to kerbin?

Actually orbiting around Kerbol... or any other unknown star.

By the way, any other attempts results in safe returns.
Welcome to the forums! Congratulations on your Munar landing
